3 Reading in a Text Corpus setwd("/Users/adra7980/Documents/diario_text/2019.11.14-ElDiarioCorpus/adverts") # read in diario adverts diario_files<-list.files(pattern=".txt") # Create corpus from diario adverts diario_adverts<-Corpus(URISource(diario_files), readerControl = list(reader=readPlain)) # creates tdm tdm_diario_adverts<-as.matrix(TermDocumentMatrix(diario_adverts, control=list(removePunctuation = TRUE, stopwords = TRUE, tolower = TRUE, stemming = FALSE, removeNumbers = TRUE, bounds = list(global = c(3, Inf))))) # prints "tdm_diario_adverts" tdm_diario_adverts
